data.lyric:
[ti:Home (《光灵》电影插曲)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/X Ambassadors/Bebe Rexha]
[al:Bright: The Album]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Home - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)/X Ambassadors/Bebe Rexha
[00:00.21]Written by：Sam Harris/David Andrew Pramik/Jacob Leslie Hawkes/David Phelps/Robert Gillies/Richard Colson Baker/David Charles Snyder
[00:00.42]Home
[00:00.73]
[00:01.79]A place where I can go
[00:03.71]
[00:04.66]To take this off my shoulders
[00:07.71]Someone take me home
[00:09.68]
[00:12.15]Home
[00:12.59]
[00:13.48]A place where I can go
[00:15.30]
[00:16.16]To take this off my shoulders
[00:19.23]Someone take me home
[00:21.33]
[00:22.22]Someone take me
[00:23.51]Look I didn't power through the struggle
[00:24.87]Just to let a little trouble knock me out of my position
[00:27.79]And interrupt the vision
[00:29.09]After everything I witnessed after all of these decisions
[00:32.13]All these miles feets inches
[00:33.43]They can't add up to the distance
[00:35.14]That I have been through just to get to
[00:38.08]A place where even if there's no closure I'm still safe
[00:41.22]I still ache from trying to keep pace
[00:44.04]Somebody give me a sign I'm starting to lose faith
[00:46.90]Now tell me how did all my dreams turn to nightmares
[00:49.60]How did I lose it when I was right there
[00:52.21]Now I'm so far that it feels like it's all gone to pieces
[00:55.72]Tell me why the world never fights fair
[00:57.86]I'm trying to find
[00:59.00]Home
[00:59.35]
[01:00.34]A place where I can go
[01:02.23]
[01:03.14]To take this off my shoulders
[01:06.11]Someone take me home
[01:08.21]
[01:10.61]Home
[01:11.11]
[01:11.83]A place where I can go
[01:13.95]
[01:14.62]To take this off my shoulders
[01:17.75]Someone take me home
[01:19.84]It's been a long time coming
[01:21.15]Someone take me
[01:22.30]Home ho-o-o-o-me
[01:27.31]
[01:28.20]Home home
[01:31.84]
[01:32.49]Someone take me
[01:34.09]Home ho-o-o-o-me
[01:39.25]
[01:39.90]Home home
[01:43.38]
[01:44.75]Look I been through so much pain
[01:46.76]And it's hard to maintain any smile on my face
[01:49.67]'Cause there's madness on my brain
[01:51.17]So I gotta make it back but my home ain't on the map
[01:53.99]Gotta follow what I'm feeling to discover where it's at
[01:56.74]I need the memory
[01:58.34]In case this fate is forever just to be sure these last days are better
[02:02.17]And if I have any enemies
[02:04.75]To give me the strength to look the devil
[02:06.62]In the face and make it home safe
[02:08.65]Now tell me how did all my dreams turn to nightmares
[02:11.53]How did I lose it when I was right there
[02:14.14]Now I'm so far that it feels like it's all gone to pieces
[02:17.53]Tell me why the world never fights fair
[02:19.89]I'm trying to find
[02:20.83]Home
[02:21.36]
[02:22.00]A place where I can go
[02:24.17]
[02:24.88]To take this off my shoulders
[02:28.00]Someone take me home
[02:30.17]
[02:31.01]Someone take me
[02:32.39]
[02:33.08]I found no cure for the loneliness
[02:36.00]I found no cure for the sickness
[02:38.79]Nothing here feels like home
[02:40.67]
[02:41.86]Crowded streets but I'm all alone
[02:43.91]
[02:44.59]I found no cure for the loneliness
[02:47.68]I found no cure for the sickness
[02:50.43]Nothing here feels like home
[02:52.42]
[02:53.30]Crowded streets but I'm all alone
[02:55.17]Someone take me
[02:55.94]Home ho-o-o-o-me
[03:01.35]Take me home
[03:02.48]Home home take me home
[03:05.32]
[03:06.17]Someone take me
[03:07.89]Home ho-o-o-o-me someone someone
[03:11.43]
[03:12.35]Nothing here feels like home
